::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod strained his gyros, trying to get the most speed.
The Cybertronian Fire was under attack, and the Maximal Matrix, he had
left there was in danger.
"Cybertronian Fire. Cybertronian Fire, this is Hot Rod, what's the
situation? I'm on my way to help, now."
